meanings.definition: Resulting from the activity of a physician or treatment
meanings.sent1: The iatrogenically induced side effects of the medication were unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The patient experienced iatrogenically caused complications after surgery.
meanings.sent3: The iatrogenically triggered allergic reaction made everyone in the hospital gasp.
meanings.sent4: Her iatrogenically altered appearance shocked her friends.
meanings.sent5: The iatrogenically related errors in the treatment plan were costly.

meanings.definition: In a manner caused by medical treatment
meanings.sent1: The medication was iatrogenically prescribed to manage the symptoms.
meanings.sent2: She iatrogenically developed a resistance to the antibiotic.
meanings.sent3: The patient iatrogenically danced out of the hospital after the successful treatment.
meanings.sent4: His recovery progressed iatrogenically, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent5: The condition improved iatrogenically, much to the doctor's delight.
